35a4('bum): tshor ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ sred pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ len pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ srid pa'i
35a5('bum): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ skye ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ rga shi'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
35a6('bum): pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ tshul khrims kyi phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la
35a7('bum): bslab par mi bgyi'am/ brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab
35b1('bum): par mi bgyi 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ phyi stong
35b2('bum): pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab
35b3('bum): bar mi bgyi 'am/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 'dus byas
35b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
35b5('bum): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid
35b6('bum): la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi
35b7('bum): 'am/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ dngos
36a1('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'o//
36a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ bsam gtan dang po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ bsam gtan
36a3('bum): gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ bsam gtan gsum pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab pa
36a4('bum): mi bgyi 'am/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ dga' ba chen po'i mtshan nyid
36a5('bum): la bslab mi bgyi 'am/ btang snyoms chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la
36a6('bum): bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par
36a7('bum): 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ dran
36b1('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
36b2('bum): kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ byang
36b3('bum): chub kyis yan lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 'phags
36b4('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge
36b5('bum): 'dzin kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ smon pa med ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la
36b6('bum): bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab mi bgyi 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid
36b7('bum): la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ de
37a1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid
37a2('bum): la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan
37a3('bum): nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ sdug bsngal
37a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par
37a5('bum): mi bgyi'am/ lam gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 'phags pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs
37a6('bum): dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 'dus
37a7('bum): ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na/ bcom ldan
37b1('bum): 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la bslabs te/ nyan thos dang rang
37b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'ang bar 'gyur/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par
37b3('bum): 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la ma zhugs na/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
37b4('bum): pa nyid ma thob na/ ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi/ chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor na/ ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o//
37b5('bum): theg pa chen pos sems can rnams 'khor ba las dgrol bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos la la zhig la mtshan
37b6('bum): nyid yod na ni de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de la bslab par 'gyur na/ chos thams cad la mtshan nyid med cing gzugs med
37b7('bum): bstan tu med/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan
38a1('bum): nyid la yang bslab par mi bya mtshan nyid med pa la yang bslab par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon chad mtshan nyid med par
38a2('bum): gyur pa 'am/ phyis mtshan nyid yod par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor chos 'di dag ni sngon chad kyang mtshan nyid med la/ da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pas na
38a3('bum): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la yang bslab par mi bya/ mtshan nyid med pa la yang bslab par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
38a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings 'di ni de bzhin du gnas pa'o//
38a5('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad la mtshan nyid ma mchis shing / mtshan nyid tha dad pa yang ma lags/ mtshan nyid gcig pa
38a6('bum): yang ma lags/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
38a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bsgoms par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'dra bar
38b1('bum): mi nus so// zhan thos kyis dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa'i
38b2('bum): skyon ma mchis par 'jug par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par bzhugs par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skye
38b3('bum): ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par mi nus so// mi skye ba'i chos la bzong pa ma bskyed par ni/ mngon par shes pa bsgrub par mi nus so// byang chub sems
38b4('bum): dpa'i mngon par shes pa bsgrubs par ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ning yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par mi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi
38b5('bum): zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par ma bgyis par ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
38b6('bum): pa nyid thob par ma bgyis par ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi nus so// chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar ni sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
38b7('bum): le dgod par mi nus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so// dgra bcom pa nyid la
39a1('bum): dgod par mi nus so// rang byang chub la dgod par mi nus so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod/
39a2('bum): bar mi nus so// sems can rnams sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so// tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams
39a3('bum): bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so// bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po le dgod par mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
39a4('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ mtshan nyid tha dad pa yang ma yin/ mtshan nyid gcig
39a5('bum): pa yang ma yin no// gsol pa de ltar chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis na/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
39a6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni/ mtshan nyid tha dad pa yang ma yin/ mtshan
39a7('bum): nyid gcig pa yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid tha dad pa med par bsgom pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
39b1('bum): pa'o// gsol ba de ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams
39b2('bum): cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
39b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
39b4('bum): bsgom pa'o// tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
39b5('bum): pa bsgom pa'o// 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi
39b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
39b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sna rnam par bsgom par bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lce rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi
40a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yid rnam par bsgom
40a2('bum): pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sgra rnam par
40a3('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dri rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ro rnam par
40a4('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// reg rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos rnam
40a5('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
40a6('bum): pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/
40a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgo ba bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi rnam par
40b1('bum): shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
40b2('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom
40b3('bum): po bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// snga'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
40b4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
40b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg
40b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
40b7('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya bsgom pa'o//
41a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus
41a2('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
41a3('bum): rnam par bsgob pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
41a4('bum): bsgom pa'o// chu'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// me'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
41a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rlung gi khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// nam mkha'i khams
41a6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
41a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rten cing 'brel bapar 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ma rig pa rnam
41b1('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
41b2('bum): rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ming dang gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
41b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skye mched drug rnam par bsgob pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// reg pa rnam par bsgom
41b4('bum): pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sred pa rnam
41b5('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// len pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
41b6('bum): srid pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skye ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
41b7('bum): bsgom pa'o// rga shi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// blang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
42a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bsam
42a2('bum): gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan gnyis pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
42a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan
42a4('bum): bzhi pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
42a5('bum): bsgom pa'o// snying rje rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dga' ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
42a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
42a7('bum): kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par
42a8('bum): bsgom pa
42b1('bum): 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgob pa'o// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom
42b2('bum): ba bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
42b3('bum): ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brnas
42b4('bum): par// chos rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgob pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bska
42b5('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
42b6('bum): pa'o// btong ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo ba'o// lha rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
42b7('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skye ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
43a1('bum): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
43a2('bum): 'chi ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
43a3('bum): ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
43a4('bum): sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bdag med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
43a5('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
43a6('bum): pa'o// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bdag gi 'du shes rnam par
43a7('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sems can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
43b1('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa'o// srog gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skye ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom
43b2('bum): pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gso ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
43b3('bum): ba'o// skyes bu'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gang zag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
43b4('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// shed can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
43b5('bum): pa'o// shed bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byed pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa/
43b6('bum): bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshor ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bsgom/
43b7('bum): ba'o// shes pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa
44a1('bum): / bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/
44a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bsgom pa'o// bde ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug pa'i
44a3('bum): 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi
44a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yang dag par
44a5('bum): spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi ba
44a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dbang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stobs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
44a7('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
44b1('bum): ba'o// lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
44b2('bum): ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
44b3('bum): pa bsgom pa'o// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad
44b4('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgob pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
44b5('bum): ba ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
44b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
44b7('bum): pa'o// rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal
45a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// kun 'byung ba
45a2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bsgom pa'o// 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa
45a3('bum): bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
45a4('bum): bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal shes pa bsgo ma pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// kun 'byung ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa
45a5('bum): bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'gog pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// /
45a6('bum): lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi
45a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi skye shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos shes pa rnam par bsgom/
45b1('bum): pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rjes su 'gro ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
45b2('bum): bsgom pa'o// kun rdzob shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya bsgom pa'o// 'dris pa shes pa rnam par
45b3('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
45b4('bum): pa bsgom pa'o// sbyin pa'i byin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
45b5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi
45b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bsam
45b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom
46a1('bum): pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
46a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom
46a3('bum): pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
46a4('bum): chen po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
46a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'dus ma
46a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
46a7('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
46b1('bum): pa bsgom pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom
46b2('bum): pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
46b3('bum): bsgom pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam
46b4('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
46b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
46b6('bum): stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
46b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gzungs kyi
47a1('bum): sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/
47a2('bum): bcu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi 'jig pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
47a3('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
47a4('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byams pa chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
47a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
47a6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
47a7('bum): kyi byin pa bsgom pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par
47b1('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
47b2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa
47b3('bum): bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
47b4('bum): ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
47b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du shes rnam
47b6('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
47b7('bum): lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
48a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bsgom pa
48a2('bum): lags/ ji ltar na sna rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lce rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
48a3('bum): byin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
48a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sgra
48a5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dri rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
48a6('bum): ji ltar na ro rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na reg rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
48a7('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
48b1('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar nan ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
48b2('bum): na sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes
48b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ di ltar
48b4('bum): na yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
48b5('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
48b6('bum): ji ltar na sA'i 'dus te rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
48b7('bum): ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
49a1('bum): ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig
49a2('bum): gi 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
49a3('bum): tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
49a4('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
49a5('bum): pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
49a6('bum): ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sa'i khams rnam par
49a7('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chu'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
49b1('bum): ji ltar na me'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rlung gi khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi
49b2('bum): rol tu byin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes
49b3('bum): pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
49b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed rnam
49b5('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa bsgom pa
49b6('bum): lags/ ji ltar na ming dang gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched drug rnam par bsgom pa
49b7('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
50a1('bum): ltar na tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sred pa rnam par bsgom
50a2('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na len pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
50a3('bum): ltar na srid pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
50a4('bum): byin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rga shi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na blang ba rnam par bsgom pa
50a5('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji
50a6('bum): ltar na bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gnyis pa rnam par bsgom pa
50a7('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
50b1('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byams pa rnam par bsgom
50b2('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na snying rje che rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
50b3('bum): ji ltar na dga' ba rnam par bsgob pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
50b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
50b5('bum): byin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
50b6('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
50b7('bum): ltar na 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
51a1('bum): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos rjes su
51a2('bum): dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dge 'dun rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha
51a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
51a4('bum): gtong ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lha rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
51a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skyo ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
51a6('bum): ji ltar na dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'chi ba rjes su dran pa rnam par
51a7('bum): bsres pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha
51b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug
51b2('bum): bsngal gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bdag med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
51b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
51b4('bum): ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom
51b5('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sems can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
51b6('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na srog gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye ba'i 'du shes
51b7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gso ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha
52a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skyes bu'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
52a2('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gang zag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shed kyi 'du shes
52a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shed bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha
52a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byed pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
52a5('bum): na tshor ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shes pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa
52a6('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
52a7('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bde ba'i
52b1('bum): 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes
52b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
52b3('bum): de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yang dag par myong ba rnam par bsgom pa
52b4('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag
52b5('bum): ji ltar na dbang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stobs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha
52b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
52b7('bum): lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
53a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi
53a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam
53a3('bum): par thar pa brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par
53a4('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
53a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
53a6('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
53a7('bum): ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden
53b1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha
53b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug
53b3('bum): bsngal shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun 'byung ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha
53b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'gog pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam shes pa
53b5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na zad pa shes pa rnam pa bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
53b6('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na mi skye ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
53b7('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rjes su 'gro ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
54a1('bum): na kun rdzob shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dres pa shes pa rnam par
54a2('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sgra ji bzhin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
54a3('bum): ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom
54a4('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
54a5('bum): lags/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol
54a6('bum): tu phyin pa rnam par bsgob pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
54a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags// ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi stong
54b1('bum): pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
54b2('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chen po stong pa
54b3('bum): nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
54b4('bum): byin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus ma byas
54b5('bum): stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
54b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
54b7('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam
55a1('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom lags/ ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom
55a2('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
55a3('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa
55a4('bum): nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol
55a5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
55a6('bum): ltar na mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
55a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
55b1('bum): ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par bsgom
55b2('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
55b3('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
55b4('bum): byams pa chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
55b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
55b6('bum): ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par
55b7('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
56a1('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag/
56a2('bum): ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
56a3('bum): pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
56a4('bum): cad spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags//
56a5('bum): bam po gsum pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
56a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// tshor ba dngos
56a7('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam
56b1('bum): par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mig dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rna ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sna dngos po yod
56b2('bum): ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lce dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lus dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// yid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
56b3('bum): gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sgra dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dri dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// ro dngos po yod
56b4('bum): ces bya bar mi sgom mo// reg dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// chos dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos
56b5('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
56b6('bum): bsgom mo// lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// yid
56b7('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos
57a1('bum): yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po
57a2('bum): yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
57a3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
57a4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
57a5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom
57a6('bum): mo// sa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// chu'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// me'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
57a7('bum): sgom mo// rlung gi khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// nam mkha'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rnam par shes pa'i khams
57b1('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi skyom mo// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// ma rig pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
57b2('bum): 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi skem mo// ming dang gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
57b3('bum): skye mched drug dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sred
57b4('bum): pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// len pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// srid pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// skye ba dngos
57b5('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rga shi dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// blang ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dor ba dngos po yod
57b6('bum): ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bsam gtan dang po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bsam gtan gnyis pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo/
57b7('bum): bsam gtan gsum pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bsam gtan bzhi pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// byam pa dngos po yod ces bya
58a1('bum): bar mi sgom mo// snying rje dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dga' ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
58a2('bum): btang snyoms dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rnam
58a3('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod
58a4('bum): ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sangs rgyas rjes
58a5('bum): su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// chos rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces
58a6('bum): bye bar mi sgom mo// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// gtong ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo
58a7('bum): lha rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// skyo ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su
58b1('bum): dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces
58b2('bum): bya bar mi sgom mo// mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bdag med
58b3('bum): ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom ma// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces
58b4('bum): bya bar mi sgom mo// bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sems can gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// srog gi 'du/
58b5('bum): shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// skye ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// gso' ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom
58b6('bum): mo// skyes bu'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// gang zag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// shed can gyi 'du shes
58b7('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// shed bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// byed pa po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
59a1('bum): tshor ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// shes pa po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
59a2('bum): mthong ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rtag pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bde ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
59a3('bum): sgom mo// sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
59a4('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
59a5('bum): sgom mo// dbang po rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// stobs rnams dngos po yod ces bya ba mi sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
59a6('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lam dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mtshan ma med pa
59a7('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// smon med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rnam par thar pa brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom/
59b1('bum): mo// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod
59b2('bum): ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
59b3('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa
59b4('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod
59b5('bum): ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sdug bsngal shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// kun 'byung ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'gog
59b6('bum): bshes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lam shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// zad pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
59b7('bum): mi skye ba shes pa dngos du po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// chos shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dngos po yod ces/
60a1('bum): bya bar mi sgom mo// kun rdzob shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'dris pa shes pa dngos po yod ces
60a2('bum): bya bar mi sgom mo// sgra ji bzhin shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// tshul
60a3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// brtson 'grus kyi
60a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// shes rab kyi pha rol
60a5('bum): tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
60a6('bum): bsgom mo// phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// chen po stong
60a7('bum): ba nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dor dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya
60b1('bum): bar mi sgom mo// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
60b2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rang bzhin stong pa
60b3('bum): nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi slom mo// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod
60b4('bum): ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo//
60b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mngon par shes
60b6('bum): pa lnga dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// ting nge 'dzin thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dngos po yod ces bya
60b7('bum): bar mi sgom mo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// so so
61a1('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po
61a2('bum): yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// byams pa chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// snying rje chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rgyun du zhugs
61a3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po
61a4('bum): yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rang byang chub dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lam gyi rnam
61a5('bum): pa shes pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
61a6('bum): ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
61a7('bum): byin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la brtson 'grus kyi pha
61b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
61b2('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pha ral ta phan pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes la nang stong pa nyid bsgom
61b3('bum): pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la
61b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes la don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom
61b5('bum): pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do//
61b6('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do//
61b7('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can
62a1('bum): la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do//
62a2('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du
62a3('bum): shes can la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la
62a4('bum): dngon par shes pa drug bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la gzungs kyi sgo thams
62a5('bum): cad bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa med do//
62a6('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i
62a7('bum): 'du shes can la byams pa chen po bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la snying rje chen po bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
62b1('bum): 'bras bu myed do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa
62b2('bum): med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang byang chub bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du
62b3('bum): shes can la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can lnga rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du
62b4('bum): shes can la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba bsgom pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dngos po la 'di ni bdag gi
62b5('bum): bdag gi zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags ste/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang /
62b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
62b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa
63a1('bum): nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs
63a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge
63a3('bum): 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
63a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / rgyun tu zhags pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
63a5('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / bag chags kyi
63a6('bum): mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur pas gang mtha' gnyis la chags pa de ni thar pa med de/
63a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can ni/ sbyin pa med/ tshul khrims kyang med/ bzod pa yang med/ brtson 'grus kyang med/ bsam gtan yang
63b1('bum): med/ shes rab yang med/ lam yang med/ ye shes kyang med/ thob pa yang med/ mngon par rtog pa yang med/ 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang med/ gzugs
63b2('bum): kyang yongs su shes pa med/ tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ 'du byed kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa yang
63b3('bum): yongs su shes pa med// mig kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ sna yang yongs su shes pa med/ lce yang yongs su shes pa med//
63b4('bum): lus kyang yongs su shes pa med/ yid kyang yongs su shes pa med// gzugs kyang shes pa med/ sgra ye shes pa med/ dri yang yongs su shes pa med/
63b5('bum): ro yang yongs su shes pa med/ reg kyang yongs su shes pa med/ chos kyang yongs su shes pa med// mig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su shes pa med/ rna
63b6('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med//
63b7('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med// mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa
64a1('bum): med/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ lce'i 'dus te
64a2('bum): reg pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa med// mig gi 'dus
64a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
64a4('bum): tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang
64a5('bum): yongs su shes pa med/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa med// sa'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ chu'i khams
64a6('bum): kyang yongs su shes pa med/ me'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rlung gi khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ nam mkha'i khams kyang yongs su shes
64a7('bum): ba med/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ ma rig pa yang yongs su shes
64b1('bum): pa med/ 'du byed kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ ming dang gzugs kyang yongs su shes pa med/ skye mched drug kyang
64b2('bum): yongs su shes pa med/ reg pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ sred pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ len pa yang yongs
64b3('bum): su shes pa med/ srid pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ skye ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ rga shi yang yongs su shes pa med/ blang ba yang yongs su shes pa
64b4('bum): med/ dor ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan dang po yang yongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan gnyis pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ bsam
64b5('bum): gtan gsum pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan bzhi pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ byams pa yongs su shes pa med/ snying rje yang yongs su
64b6('bum): shes pa med/ dga' ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ btang snyoms kyang yongs su shes pa med/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par
64b7('bum): 'jug pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched
65a1('bum): kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa
65a2('bum): yang yongs su shes pa med/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ chos rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ dge 'dun
65a3('bum): rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med//
65a4('bum): lha rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ skyo ba rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med// dbug phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes
65a5('bum): pa med// 'chi ba rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes
65a6('bum): kyang yongs su shes pa med/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ bdag med pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mi sdug
65a7('bum): pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ dngos po med pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ bdag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med
65b1('bum): sems can gyi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ srog gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ skye ba'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ gso
65b2('bum): ba'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ skyes bu'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ gang zag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ shed
65b3('bum): can gyi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ shed bdag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ byed po po'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med//
65b4('bum): tshor ba po'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ shes pa po'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mthong ba po'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med//
65b5('bum): rtag pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med// bde ba'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ sdug pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ bdag
65b6('bum): gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yang yongs su shes pa med/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang yongs su shes
65b7('bum): pa med/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su shes pa med/ dbang po rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ stobs rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/
66a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ lam yang yongs su shes pa med/ stong pa nyid kyi
66a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa med/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes
66a3('bum): pa med/ rnam par thar pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rtog pa dang
66a4('bum): bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rtog
66a5('bum): pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa med/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ kun 'byung ba 'bas
66a6('bum): pa'i bden pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yongs su
66a7('bum): shes pa med/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ kun 'byung ba shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ 'gog pa shes pa
66b1('bum): yang yongs su shes pa med/ lam shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ zad pa shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ mi skye ba shes pa yang yongs su shes
66b2('bum): ba med/ chos shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ rjes su 'gro ba shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ kun rdzob shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ 'dris
66b3('bum): pa shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ sgra ji bzhin shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ tshul
66b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang
66b5('bum): yongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su shes pa med/
66b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang yongasasu shes pa med/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ stong pa nyid spong ba
66b7('bum): nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ 'dus byas stong
67a1('bum): pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
67a2('bum): nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rang
67a3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/
67a4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su
67a5('bum): shes pa med/ mngon par shes pa drug kyang yongs su shes pa med/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang yongs su shes pa med/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyang
67a6('bum): yongasu shes med/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang yongs su shes pa med/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang yongs su shes pa med/ so so yang dag par
67a7('bum): rig pa bzhi yang yongs su shes pa med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang yongs su shes pa med/ byams pa chen po yang yongs su shes pa med//
67b1('bum): snying rje chen po yang yongs su shes pa med/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yongs su shes pa med/ lan cig phyir 'ongs pa'i 'bras bu yang yongs su shes

67b3('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon
67b4('bum): pa thams cad spang ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ de thar par 'gyur ba 'gyur ba lta ga las 'ong // gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi
67b5('bum): ba ni ci lags/ dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gnyis ni dngos po yod pa'o// mi
67b6('bum): gnyis pa ni dngos po med pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gnyis zhes bya ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs/
67b7('bum): kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'du byed kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rnam par
68a1('bum): shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// mig gi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rna ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sna'i 'du shes ni

74a6('bum): yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyom par 'jug pa yongs su shes par 'gyur

74b1('bum): par 'jug pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ chos rjes su dran pa yongs
74b2('bum): su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba stag la yod/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yongs su shes par

74b5('bum): pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes yongs

75b1('bum): su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ bdag gi 'du shes yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'du shes yongs

76a1('bum): tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yod

78b1('bum): skyon ma mchis par chud par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur

81b1('bum): 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa dang bcas pa'i dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan

82a1('bum): bye/ bzung ste/ bsam gtan de dag gis snyoms par ma gyur/ bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar ma gyur bsam gtan du dmigs par ma gyur te/

82a3('bum): tha dad mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems gzhol bar bya/ pha rol gyi sems shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir
82a4('bum): sems gzhol bar bya/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems gzhol bar bya/ lha'i mig gi shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems
82a5('bum): gzhol bar bya/ 'on kyang ngas mngon par shes pa mngon du bya ba de dag la mtshan mar bzung ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis shes par ma gyur ro myong bar ma gyur/

82a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di ni sdug bsngal lo// 'di ni
82b1('bum): sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mo zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du yongs

82b3('bum): dang ldan par gyur/ byams pa chen po dang ldan pa gyur/ snying rje chen po dang ldan par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang ldan par gyur nas/
82b4('bum): sems can rnams phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur to// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
82b5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bsam gtan bzhi bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
82b6('bum): drug mngon par mkhyen pa bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po
82b7('bum): ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mi 'jigs pa bzhi bskyed par/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bskyed par gyur/
83a1('bum): ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis byams pa chen po bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi snying rje chen
83a2('bum): po bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par gyur/ sems can rnams kyang sems can ma
83a3('bum): mchis par ji ltar phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa rnams dang sdig to mi dge ba'i chos
83a4('bum): rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/ ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am gzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pa
83a5('bum): rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bsam gtan bzhi nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par
83a6('bum): yang mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams dang sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa gzhan gyi dngos po med pa ste/
83a7('bum): gzhan du ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas rab 'byor de'i phyir sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis/
83b1('bum): dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to//
83b2('bum): rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa spyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes
83b3('bum): pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa las nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur te/ dga' ba la 'dod chags dang bral bas dran zhing shes bzhin
