302b2('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams sdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste
302b3('bum): bzhi gang zhe na sbyin pa dang tshig snyan dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par
302b4('bum): gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i
302b5('bum): dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas
302b6('bum): kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyis phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems
302b7('bum): dpo' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang tshig snyan pa dang don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o//
303a1('bum): rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
303a2('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/
303a3('bum): bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la
303a4('bum): rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa sems
303a5('bum): dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor
303a6('bum): ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
303a7('bum): dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang don
303b1('bum): spyad pa dang don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
303b2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig
303b3('bum): snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig
303b4('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe
303b5('bum): na sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o//
303b6('bum): bam po bcu gsum pa'o// // rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams sdu dang
303b7('bum): yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams sdud de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /
304a1('bum): chos kyi sbyin pa dang / rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud
304a2('bum): pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gser ram/ dngul lam/ nor bu 'am/ mu
304a3('bum): tig gam/ bai DUr+ya 'am/ dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byi ru 'am/ sa le sbra ma 'am/ zas sam/ skom 'am/ gdugs sam/ gos sam/ spos
304a4('bum): sam/ 'phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ mal cha'am/ stan nam/ 'tshe ba 'am/ bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ rta 'am/ glang po 'am/ bdag po
304a5('bum): yongs su gtong na 'di skad du skye sems can dag tshur sheg/ bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra mi nos par khyer cig/ long la deng cig ces brjod de/ sbyin pa
304a6('bum): des sbyin pa des byin nA/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su gtong ngo // chos la skyabs su gtong ngo // dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong ngo // la la ni bslab
304a7('bum): pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin du 'dzud do// la la ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas pa la nye bar gnas par byed do// la la ni dge ba bcu'i las
304b1('bum): kyi lam rnams la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan dang po la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan gsum
304b2('bum): ba la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do// la la ni byams pa la 'god do// la la ni snying rje la 'god do// la la ni dga' ba la
304b3('bum): 'god do// la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do// la la ni nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do// la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye
304b4('bum): mched la 'god do// la la ni cung zad med pa'i skye mched la 'god do// la la ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la 'god do// la la ni
304b5('bum): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni chos rjes su dran pa yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la
304b6('bum): yang dag par skul lo// la la ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa yang dag par skul lo// la la
304b7('bum): ni lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni lus mi gtsang ba las sogs bI 'du shes su so sor brtag pa la yang dag par skul lo//
305a1('bum): la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni yang dag
305a2('bum): par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par skal lo// la la ni dbang po lnga la yang dag par skul lo//
305a3('bum): la la ni stobs lnga la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
305a4('bum): la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rnam par thar pa brgyad
305a5('bum): la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul lo// le la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
305a6('bum): la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skal lo// la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la
305a7('bum): ni byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la yang dag
305b1('bum): par skal lo// la la ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su grub pa la yang dag par skal lo// la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu la yang dag par skul
305b2('bum): lo// la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skal lo// la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skal lo// la la ni phyir mi
305b3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skal lo// la la ni dgra ba com pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rang byang chub la yang dag par skul lo// la la
305b4('bum): ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
305b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing thabs mkhas pas
305b6('bum): bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ji ltar na
305b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab
306a1('bum): 'byor gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa
306a2('bum): gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi brjod pa dang bshad pa dang / ma nor bar bstan pa ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
306a3('bum): tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos/ byis
306a4('bum): pa so so'i skye bo de dag dang mthun mong du gyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
306a5('bum): po des 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas/ rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de las skyod do// de las bskyod nas thabs mkhas
306a6('bum): bas/ 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la rab tu 'god de// de la 'phags chos rnams ni/ gang 'phags pa'i chos rnams
306a7('bum): kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
306b1('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med
306b2('bum): pa dang smon pa med pa rnams so// 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i
306b3('bum): 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i chos ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o//
306b4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o//
306b5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
306b6('bum): byin pa shes pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// stong
306b7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid shes pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa
307a1('bum): nyid shes pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dor ba med pa
307a2('bum): stong pa nyid shes pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// mi
307a3('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
307a4('bum): shes pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes pa'o// dbang po lnga
307a5('bum): shes pa'o// stobs lnga shes pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o// 'phags
307a6('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi shes pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o// tshad med pa bzhi shes pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o//
307a7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad shes pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa smon pa
307b1('bum): med pa shes pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams shes pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
307b2('bum): bcu shes pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi shes pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes pa'o//
307b3('bum): byams pa chen po shes pa'o// snying rje chen po shes pa'o// dga' ba chen po shes pa'o// btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang
307b4('bum): 'jig rten pa las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus byas kyi chos rnams
307b5('bum): shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so// /
307b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
307b7('bum): spong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan
308a1('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
308a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
308a3('bum): chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
308a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das
308a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod do// gsol pa/ bye brag ci lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
308a6('bum): dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas
308a7('bum): shing chos thams cad la mun pa med pa thob pa la byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
308b1('bum): kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la rten pas 'jig rten
308b2('bum): las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la
308b3('bum): sbyor zhing / thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la bkod nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bkod
308b4('bum): ba yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong
308b5('bum): ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub
308b6('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
308b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang / nyon mos pa med pa dang / smon lam gyi shes pa
309a1('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / yongs su dag pa bzhi dang / dbang po bcu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
309a2('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba med pa gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag
309a3('bum): pa gsum dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pa dang /
309a4('bum): thugs rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe
309a5('bum): byad bzang po brgya bcu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo rnams te/ 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
309a6('bum): de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nang gi lus dang / byi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can
309a7('bum): shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung
309b1('bum): ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus
309b2('bum): la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba la tshor ba'i 'du shes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus
309b3('bum): can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun 'byung /
309b4('bum): ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod
309b5('bum): tshor ba la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi sems dang phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems la
309b6('bum): sems kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can/ shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par gsal cing /
309b7('bum): rnam par spyad do// sems la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su ljinang rnam par spyong // sems la bang pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyong do// sems la kun 'byung
310a1('bum): ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten la gang yang nye bar len
310a2('bum): pa med do// nang gi chos dang phyi'i chos so// phyi nang gi chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten
310a3('bum): gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par gsal cing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i rjes
310a4('bum): su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la mi gnas par spyod cing 'jig rten la gang yang nye bar
310a5('bum): len pa med do// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig te mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa dang / skyes
310a6('bum): pa rnams spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed do// brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel
310a7('bum): zhing shin du rgyas par bya ba dang / bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos bskyed de// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos
310b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang / ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson
310b2('bum): 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o//
310b3('bum): dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang
310b4('bum): bo ste/ de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o// stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin
310b5('bum): gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi
310b6('bum): yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang
310b7('bum): chub kyi yan lag dang / shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms
311a1('bum): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam
311a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /
311a3('bum): yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam
311a4('bum): yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med
311a5('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin de/ de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
311a6('bum): ces bya'o// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i
311a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig 'di ni spen pa med
311b1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i
311b2('bum): 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnam mthong ba de ni/ rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// nam
311b3('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di
311b4('bum): ni/ rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med
311b5('bum): min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam
311b6('bum): par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la 'dod pas
311b7('bum): dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i dben pa las skyed pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar
312a1('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur
312a2('bum): pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags
312a3('bum): dang bral bas/ dran pa ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba
312a4('bum): la rnam par sbyong ba btang snyoms pa'o// zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs
312a5('bum): sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal yang med/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs
312a6('bum): su dag pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du
312a7('bum): shes nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
312b1('bum): gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
312b2('bum): gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod de zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar
312b3('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrub
312b4('bum): te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba la 'gog pa la nye bar
312b5('bum): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o// de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ mtha' dag sa dang /
312b6('bum): mtha' dag chu dang / mtha' dag me dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po// mtha' dag ser po dang / mtha' dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag
312b7('bum): dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang / mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o// de la zil gyis non
313a1('bum): pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha
313a2('bum): dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis non pa'i skye
313a3('bum): mched dang po'o// nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol kyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang /
313a4('bum): gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te/ shes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o// nang
313a5('bum): gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan
313a6('bum): te shes/ zil gyis man te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnan pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes
313a7('bum): shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis gnan te shes/ zil
313b1('bum): gyis mnan te mthong zhing de mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi
313b2('bum): gzugs sngon po'o// kha dog sngon po sngon por snang ba mdog sngon po// 'di lta ste dper na/ me tog o ma kha lta bu 'am/ yul pa ra na ser byas
313b3('bum): pa'i gos ltar sngo ba kha dog sngo ba/ sngo bar snang ba/ mdog sngo bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing
313b4('bum): de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyis gzugs ser po// ser por snang ba
313b5('bum): mdog ser po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing kar shi ka ra'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar ser ba kha dog ser ba ser bar snang
313b6('bum): ba/ mdog ser bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis non
313b7('bum): pa'i skye mched drug pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar por snang ba mdog dmar po 'di lta ste/
314a1('bum): dper na man 'du dzi b+ha ga'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul b.ran ser byas pa'i gos ltar dper ba/ kha dog dmar ba dbar bar/
314a2('bum): snang ba/ mdog dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis gnan te shes/ zil gyis gnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon
314a3('bum): pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyis gzugs dkar po// kha dog dkar po dkar por snang ba/ mdog
314a4('bum): dkar po 'di lta ste/ dper na skar ma ba ba sangs kyi 'od lta bu 'am/ yul ba ra ser byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba kha dog dkar bar snang ba mthong yang /
314a5('bum): gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o// de la
314a6('bum): nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa/ sems can pha rol dang
314a7('bum): gang zag pha rol gyis nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i mthu yod pa/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis bsgrubs pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o// smon lam gyi shes
314b1('bum): pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te 'di shes par bya'o zhes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes pa 'am/ shes pa
314b2('bum): gang dang gang 'dod par 'gyur ba de la yid kyis smon pa byed de/ de ting nge 'dzin de las la ngas nas de'i smon lam de yongs su grub par gyur cing / shes bya
314b3('bum): ba de yang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o// de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i mig gi mngon
314b4('bum): bar shes pa dang lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang pha rol kyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /
314b5('bum): zad pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po dag go// de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na lus yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang
314b6('bum): sems yongs su dag pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag pa ste bzhi po de dag go/ de la dbang po bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang /
314b7('bum): yo byad la dab ngo bo dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon pa la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye
315a1('bum): shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag go/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/
315a2('bum): rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma
315a3('bum): yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i las dang / lnga yongs su blang ba'i rnam par smin
315a4('bum): pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// khams sna tshogs can/ khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten
315a5('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyed to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang mos pa du ma ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
315a6('bum): mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// kun du
315a7('bum): 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po dang stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par
315b1('bum): thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
315b2('bum): mkhyen to// rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang /
315b3('bum): tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs so// skal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/
315b4('bum): skal pa brgya'i bar dang / skal pa brgya phrag du ma dang skal pa stong phrag du ma dang / skal pa brgya stong phrag du ma dang / skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
315b5('bum): stong du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go// ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur te/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar
315b6('bum): gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// zas ni 'di za za'o yun ni 'od srid cig tu gnas gnas so// tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/
315b7('bum): bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas sa
316a1('bum): mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so// lha'i mig rnam par dag pa
316a2('bum): mi las 'das pas sems can shi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag kyang gzigs so// kha dog sdug pa dang bzang ba dang ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'god pa dang / ngan
316a3('bum): song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dong ba'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen to// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan
316a4('bum): pa/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i
316a5('bum): rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/ ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung po sems can dmyal bar skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang
316a6('bum): ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag
316a7('bum): par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris su 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to// zag pa rnam
316b1('bum): zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba zag pa med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// bcu po de dag ni de
316b2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs
316b3('bum): rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ de la chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/
316b4('bum): bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'o tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par
316b5('bum): rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bdag bde ba thob pa dang bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/
316b6('bum): khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam bram ze'aM/
316b7('bum): lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bkor bar bya'o// bdag zag
317a1('bum): pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am
317a2('bum): bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes
317a3('bum): su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob
317a4('bum): bar rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig
317a5('bum): rten na dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par skor bar mi nus par bdag gis rab tu
317a6('bum): bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la sten na/ bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze
317a7('bum): 'am lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang
317b1('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jig pa thob par
317b2('bum): rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo'i 'jig rten na dge
317b3('bum): sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos ldan par bskor mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o//
317b4('bum): gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba'i rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas
317b5('bum): nas/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa pa'am skye dga'i tshogs
317b6('bum): gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su
317b7('bum): ma mthong bas/ de la bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jig pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su
318a1('bum): dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrog go// tshangs pa'i khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'am lha 'am bdud
318a2('bum): dam tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par skor bar mi nus par bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ni ma
318a3('bum): 'jigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag rig
318a4('bum): ba dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos
318a5('bum): dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na
318a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las
318a7('bum): shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcas par rgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni srung ba med pa dang po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung
318b1('bum): gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang
318b2('bum): yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ de ni srung ba med pa gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su
318b3('bum): dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par
318b4('bum): dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ de ni srung ba med pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum
318b5('bum): gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/ la las rna ba btud de rim 'gror nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos
318b6('bum): dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur/ thugs yang yeng por mi 'gyur
318b7('bum): te/ 'di ni 'gongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// la la rna ba btud de de rim 'gro nyan cing bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med pa dang / chos dang
319a1('bum): gnyer ba'i chos la nan du mi byed na/ yang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs 'khro bar mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi 'gyur/
319a2('bum): thugs mi ches par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la rna ba btud de rim 'gror nyan cang bka' nyan pa'i sems
319a3('bum): nye bar gzhog la/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed/ la la rna ba btud de rim 'gror mi nyan cing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog
319a4('bum): pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa dang / thugs khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur te/
319a5('bum): thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyam
319a6('bum): pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa las dus
319a7('bum): las mi 'da' ba ste/ de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/
319b1('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang mi mnga' ste/ de ni bag
319b2('bum): chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang dag dang
319b3('bum): ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtogs pa
319b4('bum): mdzad ces bya ste/ dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag
319b5('bum): par 'byung ste/ de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
319b6('bum): pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// ca co mi mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam pa ma bzhag pa mi mnga'o//
319b7('bum): ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o// mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// dgongs pa yongs su nyams
320a1('bum): pa mi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongs
320a2('bum): su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes bsngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes
320a3('bum): kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes
320a4('bum): sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'azeng ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags
320a5('bum): ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
320a6('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmigs pa med pas dran pas dbang sgyur ba zhi
320a7('bum): ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu
320b1('bum): gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin du gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba dang / phyag dang nam
320b2('bum): bzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / mdun shin du mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan
320b3('bum): lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser
320b4('bum): gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin du 'jam pa dang / sku re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang /
320b5('bum): 'phrag pa'i lhan mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shin du rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog dang / shing n+ya gro da ltar chur zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug
320b6('bum): dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin du yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / tshems shin du dkar ba dang / tshems mnyam
320b7('bum): pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar nag 'phyes pa dang / ba'i rtsi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs
321a1('bum): pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la/ 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su
321a2('bum): rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa 'am pa so la gzugs brkos pa dang / 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi mthil
321a3('bum): gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing zhabs pa med pas/ zhabs shin du gnas pa'o// ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel pa mnga'
321a4('bum): bas phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa'o shing bal gyi ye'u ltar shin du 'jam zhing gzhon pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o// phyag dang zhabs dang
321a5('bum): 'gur gyi lhan shin du mtho bas/ bdun shin du mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo ring ba'o// rting pa'i rang bas rting pa yangs pa'o//
321a6('bum): sku lag pa bdun du 'phags la/ drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o// pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'o// spu gyen
321a7('bum): du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o// ri dgas e ne ya'i byin pa dang / smig pa 'am ldum bu dang ba ltar drang zhing ma nyams
321b1('bum): ma rim gyis gnol par 'gyu cing byin pa zlum pas dgas min ma'i byin pa bya'o// ba drang por bzhag stes btung kya dbyug gi 'phel gnyis kyis thus
321b2('bum): lha nga la reg pas phyag bar drang por slebs pa'o// glang po dang rtacang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin du mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas
321b3('bum): sbubs su nub pa'o// shin du sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog go/ gser dang dngul shin du sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms
321b4('bum): pa'i mdog du 'dug la sku la rdul mi gos pas mdog shin du 'jam pa'o// shin du rnam par 'phye ba'i sku re res skyes shing gnyis su med pas/ sU re re nas g.yas
321b5('bum): phyogs su 'khyil pa'o// me tog kun dang / zla ba dang / 'o ma dang ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la nyi ma dang zla brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod
321b6('bum): spus/ sman mtshams shin du brgyan pas/ zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o// ro stod che bas seng ge'i ro stad do// 'gur dang rgyud legs par 'brel cing
321b7('bum): lhun zlum pas phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par 'grub pa'o// gser gyi gtan pa shin du byis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o// rlung
322a1('bum): dang khris pa dang bad kan gyis ma nyams shing / rnam par shes pa 'dre ba med pas ro tho ba'i mchog go// sku chu zheng 'dom
322a2('bum): gang du mnyam pas shing n+ya gro da ltar chung zheng gab pa'o// spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing
322a3('bum): legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas/ dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog ud pa la dmar po'i mdab ma'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing shin du
322a4('bum): yangs pas ljags shin du yangs shing srab pa'o// tshangs pa dang bya ka li bid ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa me
322a5('bum): long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub cing mdzes par skyes te/ yid du 'ongs pas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o// me tog kun d+ha dang dung gi bcag
322a6('bum): 'phro ltar shin du dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems shin du dkar ba'o// tshems la mthon dman med pas tshems shin du mnyam pa'o// tshems
322a7('bum): la mtshams ma dod pas/ bla 'og gye gu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu cang ba'o// kar nag gi cha ma 'dres la shin du rnam par dag cing
322b1('bum): mdog dmar pos ma g.yogs pas spyad dkar nag 'byes pa'o// rdzi ma bla 'og shin du legs par gnas pa la ma 'dzings pas/ ba'i rdzi ma lta
322b2('bum): bu'o// de la bla ma'i bsu bskyal dang chos nyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten rjes su bsgrubs pa las sogs pa la phu dud
322b3('bum): byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin du mang ba'i snga ltas so// yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin du
322b4('bum): gnas pa'o// de ni mi g.yo zhing shin du brtan pa'i snga ltas so// sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam
322b5('bum): bzhi goms par byas pas phyag dang zhabs 'brel pa ste/ de ni myur du bsdu ba'i lnga ltas so// bza' ba dang bcang ba dang / btang ba bzhim zhing
322b6('bum): nyams su bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs bzhon cing 'jam pa dang mdun shin du mtho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang bcang ba dang btung bzhim zhing
322b7('bum): nyams su bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so// bcings pa bkrol ba dang / srog gi rim gror byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas/ sor mo ring ba
323a1('bum): dang rting pa yangs pa dang sku che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang /
323a2('bum): bzung ba mngon par spel cing 'grib par ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa ste/ de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos dang
323a3('bum): ldan pa'i snga ltas so// rig pa dang bzo'i gnas rim gror byas shing gzhan byin pa dang bdag gis blangs pas ri dgas a ne ya'i byin pa lta bu ste de ni myur
323a4('bum): du 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so// bdog cing yod pa'i nor bslangs na mi 'khor bar gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas/ phyag rlang por slebs pa ste/ de ni
323a5('bum): yo byad mnga' ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so// 'grogs pa dang mdza' ba shes dang gnyen ma phye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i
323a6('bum): spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i
323a7('bum): sde ltas so// stan dang gos dang khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po byin pas/ gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa /
323b1('bum): de gnyis ni bdan dang na bza' dang khang pa dang zhal med khang dang gnas bzang po thob pa'i snga ltas so// 'du 'ji spangs pa dang mkhan po dang slob pon dang /
323b2('bum): pha ma dang phu nu las sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gror byas pa dang btsun par byas pa dang / bcol ba rna ba la ma gzan pas spu re re nas
323b3('bum): g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so// mi snyan pa mi zer zhing mi smod la snyan par smra zhing
323b4('bum): legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas seng ge'i re stod lta bu dang / 'brags pa'i lhun mdzes par 'grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so//
323b5('bum): na ba rnams la rtsi dang rim 'gro dang / sman dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang / rim gror byas pas phrag so shin du rgyas pa dang / ro zo ba'i mchog ste/
323b6('bum): de ni nang nyung ba'i snga ltas so// skyed mos tshal dang 'khor dang brtang ba'i rdzing bu dang / rgal rka'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang 'phreng ba'i gnas dang / ste/
323b7('bum): dang cug lag khang bya ba las sogs pa gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing / bdag gi sa gzhan byin pas shing n+ya gro da lta bur chu zheng gab pa dang /
324a1('bum): dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su
324a2('bum): bde bar smra bas ljags shin du yang shing srab pa dang / de gnyis na lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan
324a3('bum): pa zhes bya ba ni/ yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su
324a4('bum): 'byung ba dang / btang mi za zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig khyal pa spangs shing dus dus su smras pas/
324a5('bum): seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so// rim gror bya ba dang / brnyas pa med la gnyis kyis 'tshe ba yongs su dag pas chem
324a6('bum): shin du dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so// yun ring po nas na zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig sma smra bas tshems thags bzang
324a7('bum): ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer mi byed pa'i snga ltas so// phang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nye bar bsams pa med la ma chag
324b1('bum): mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar gnag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so//
324b2('bum): rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
324b3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
324b4('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
324b5('bum): 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por 'byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/
324b6('bum): ser mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin du sogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
324b7('bum): 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang sku dang gsung dang
325a1('bum): sku'i 'phrin las dang / 'tsho ba shin du dben pa ste/ rtsa mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i
325a2('bum): mdud pa 'grol ste/ rtsa la mdud pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs
325a3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las grol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge
325a4('bum): ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
325a5('bum): 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhad pa ste/ ngang pa'i stabs su bzhad pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu mchog ste/
325a6('bum): khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs
325a7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/
325b1('bum): ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ sku shin du legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
325b2('bum): 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shin du spangs pa ste/ sku shin du sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rim gyis
325b3('bum): bzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin du gtsang ma yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni
325b4('bum): rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin du 'jam pa yi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs
325b5('bum): mnga' ba ste/ skra shin du rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni chos dang 'dul ba shin du rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad shin du rdzogs pa yin//
325b6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sad+yas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems
325b7('bum): can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa nyid/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jal ba'i chos
326a1('bum): ston pa ste/ sku shin du gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku zhum
326a2('bum): ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shin du rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
326a3('bum): yang 'byung ba shin du bcom zhing la zad pa ste/ sku shin du mkhregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag
326a4('bum): dang nying lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang nying lag sba bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin du rnam par
326a5('bum): dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa
326a6('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin du spangs pa ste/ phyal shin du byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas
326a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi re'u bcom paste/ phyal ma zhom pa yid/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par zlog pa ste/
326b1('bum): phyal phyam mer 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin du thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
326b2('bum): ni mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i
326b3('bum): dge 'dun mang ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin du gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ kun spyod pa shin du gtsang
326b4('bum): ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la skye ba med pa yin/
326b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar yang rab tu thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing la ltar shin du 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas
326b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal las byams pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
326b7('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni shin du zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yang ba
327a1('bum): ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar
327a2('bum): 'chab ste/ zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du bkye ba ste/ zhal gzug
327a3('bum): kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du gtong zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shin du 'jam pa yin//
327a4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin du srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
327a5('bum): byis pa so so'i skye bo'i 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul bting dpag pa ste/ ljags shin du dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
327a6('bum): ni glang po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bur skems pa mi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
327a7('bum): ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang ma nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas
327b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun du sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems mche ba shin du zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba
327b2('bum): rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin du dkar ba ste/
327b3('bum): tshems mche ba shin du dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ tshems mche ba
327b4('bum): mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gyis
327b5('bum): gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa
327b6('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin du gtsang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs
327b7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
328a1('bum): rnams ni gzigs pa shin du rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems
328a2('bum): can gyis tshogs shin du bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma sdug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang skyes bu dang na cung mchog
328a3('bum): dmigs dkar nag dbyes shing pad mo'i mdab ma lter 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba ste/ spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad mo'i 'dab
328a4('bum): ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ smin pa ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
328a5('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni rngam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams
328a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin ma'i sku mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba snum gyis sems snum par gyur pa'i
328a7('bum): skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yengs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba
328b1('bum): ste/ sman legs shing snyan shal ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ sman mnyam pa yin/
328b2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa mnyams par 'dul ba ste/ sman gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
328b3('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
328b4('bum): rnams ni bas kyi rgol ba shin du 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'phral pa yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin du rngos
328b5('bum): pa ste/ dbu shin du rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/ dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/
328b6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mthong ba dang bsgom pas spangs pa'i bag la nyal ba zad par byas pa ste/ dbu sdug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
328b7('bum): 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'jug
329a1('bum): pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu mi 'dzings pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su
329a2('bum): bral ba ste/ dbu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu dri zhim pa
329a3('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang / kra shis dang dga' 'khyil bas brgyan pa yin/ rab 'byor de dag ni de
329a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu'o// rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de
329a5('bum): dag gzhan la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang
329a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa'
329a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so//
329b1('bum): bam po bcu bzhi pa'o// // rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
329b2('bum): po tshig snyan pas/ sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can
329b3('bum): rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
329b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub
329b5('bum): sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po sman par smra ba rnams kyis sems can rnams sdud do// cir phyir na na/ don 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi
329b6('bum): dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig sman par smra bas/ sems can
329b7('bum): rnams sdud do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
330a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do//
330a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sem
330a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas
330a4('bum): sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas
330a5('bum): sems can sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do// rab 'byor de
330a6('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
330a7('bum): chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
330b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la 'di skad 'doms shing 'di skad ston te/ rigs kyi bu khyod tshur sheg yi ge
330b2('bum): mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas
330b3('bum): par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes
330b4('bum): bar gyis shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byung ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa
330b5('bum): gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgoms shig ces ston to// rab 'byor byang chub
330b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig
330b7('bum): gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la
331a1('bum): mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na/ la la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par
331a2('bum): bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang
331a3('bum): yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ de chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang / rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i
331a4('bum): rnam pa dang bral ba yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so// gang
331a5('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad thun mong ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// @
331a6('bum): ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin du mi dmigs chos kyang mi
331a7('bum): dmigs/ chos kyi dngos po yang mi dmigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
331b1('bum): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
331b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
331b3('bum): pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge
331b4('bum): 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis
331b5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
331b6('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad
331b7('bum): bzang po brgyad bcu bsgrub cing / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur te/
332a1('bum): de la ni sems can mi dmigs te/ sems can du gdags pa yang mi dmigs so// sems can du mi dmigs pas/ gzug
332a2('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas 'du shes dmigs su ma mchis /
332a3('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas 'du byed dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems
332a4('bum): can mi dmigs pas mig dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rna ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas sna
332a5('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas lce dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas lus dmigs su ma mchis so//
332a6('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ yid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can
332a7('bum): mi dmigs pas sgra dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas dri dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas ro dmig
332b1('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas reg dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas chos dmigs su ma mchis so// sems
332b2('bum): can dmigs pas mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so//
332b3('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma
332b4('bum): mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas yid kyi rnam par
332b5('bum): shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
332b6('bum): pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can
332b7('bum): mi dmigs pas lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so//
333a1('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas mig gi
333a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma
333a3('bum): mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas lce'i
333a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs
333a5('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
333a6('bum): bas sa'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas chu'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas
333a7('bum): me'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rlung gi khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas
333b1('bum): nam mkha'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can
333b2('bum): mi dmigs pas ma rig pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas 'du byed migs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
333b3('bum): rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas ming dang gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas
333b4('bum): skye mched drug dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas tsher ba dmigs
333b5('bum): su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas sred pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas len pa dmig su so// sems
333b6('bum): can mi dmigs pas srid pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas skye ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas
333b7('bum): rga shi dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas
334a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su
334a2('bum): ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol
334a3('bum): tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas
334a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas phyi nang stong pa
334a5('bum): nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas chen po stong pa
334a6('bum): nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas 'dus byas stong
334a7('bum): pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas mtha'
334b1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi
334b2('bum): dmigs pas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can
334b3('bum): mi dmigs pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so//
334b4('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas dngos po med stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchiso// /
334b5('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma
334b6('bum): ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas yang dag par spong ba
334b7('bum): rnams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas dbang
335a1('bum): po rnams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas stobs rnams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can
335a2('bum): mi dmigs pas byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su ma
335a3('bum): mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas bsam gtan rnams
335a4('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas tshad med pa rnams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas gzugs med pa'i
335a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
335a6('bum): pas mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa

335b1('bum): de 'dzin rnams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas de

337a3('bum): ma mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis

337a5('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis

338a3('bum): ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
338a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

339b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rab
340a1('bum): 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong pa
340a2('bum): mthong nas/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston to// de ci ltar stong pa nyid de dag la yang mi 'jug pa de ltar chos ston to// des de ltar
340a3('bum): chos ston te/ des de ltar mthong nas/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te/ chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed de/ gnyis su mi byed do// yang dag
340a4('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang ston par byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni/ sprul pa bye ba phrag du ma sprul cing / sems
340a5('bum): can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la brtson 'grus
340a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan bzhi la sbyor//
340a7('bum): la la tshad med pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la yang dag par smon
340b1('bum): ba bzhi la sbyor/ la la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la dbang po lnga la sbyor/ la la stobs lnga la sbyor/ la la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyor/
340b2('bum): la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor/ la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyor/ la la mthar gyis gnas
340b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyor/ la la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la sbyor/ la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/
340b4('bum): la la ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sbyor// la le gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/ la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyor/ la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi
340b5('bum): la sbyor/ la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byams pa chen po la sbyor/ la la snying rje chen po la sbyor/ la la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
340b6('bum): bco brgyad la sbyor/ la la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la
340b7('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la sbyor/ la la rang byang chub la sbyor/ la la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la sbyor/ la la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sbyor na/ rab
341a1('bum): 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du bye ba yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom
341a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos
341a3('bum): ston te/ de dag phyin ci log pa rnams las yongs su bkrol nas/ macings ma grol ba'i tshul du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'god do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
341a4('bum): de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du shes ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings
341a5('bum): ma grol ba// mig ma bcings ma grol ba/ rna ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ sna ma bcings ma grol ba/ lce ma bcings ma grol ba/ lus ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid ma

341b5('bum): bcings ma grol ba/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma bcings ma grol ba// sa'i kham
341b6('bum): ma bcings ma grol ba/ chu'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ me'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rlung gi khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ nam mkha'i khams ma bcing
341b7('bum): ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma bcings ma grol ba/ ma rig pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ 'du byed ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba
342a1('bum): ming dang gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba/ skye mched drug ma bcings ma grol ba/ reg pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ tshor ba ma bcings ma
342a2('bum): grol ba/ sred pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ len pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ srid pa ma bcings ma grol ba/ skye ba ma bcings ma grol ba/ rga shi ma bcings ma grol ba/
