389b6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med
389b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par byed do//
390a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med
390a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i
390a3('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par
390a4('bum): byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
390a5('bum): gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang
390a6('bum): smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan pa med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa
390a7('bum): tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i
390b1('bum): tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan
390b2('bum): ma med pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan
390b3('bum): ma med pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
390b4('bum): de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mor
390b5('bum): cha shas bzhag pa tsam gyi khyon cig mtshan ma yod na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos mtshan
390b6('bum): ma med pa/ dran pa med pa yid la bya ba med pa/ de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang / zag pa med
390b7('bum): pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa yid la byed pa med pa ste/ rab 'byor
391a1('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems
391a2('bum): can thams cad kyi don byed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad ma mtshan ma mchis shing dran pa ma mchis ste/ yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/
391a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so//
391a4('bum): 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di
391a5('bum): dag ni thun mong gi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni byang
391a6('bum): chub sems dpa'i chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
391a7('bum): ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
391b1('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/
391b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
391b3('bum): de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
391b4('bum): 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub po// byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi chos so//
391b5('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs
391b6('bum): des na 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
391b7('bum): dpa' chen po ni/ dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
392a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
392a2('bum): dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
392a3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong
392a4('bum): pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
392a5('bum): pa stong pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
392a6('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa
392a7('bum): bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
392b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
392b2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
392b3('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo// de ci'i
392b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab
392b5('bum): par bya ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni//
392b6('bum): stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i
392b7('bum): sgo ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis la
393a1('bum): slob pa yin/ khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin//
393a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ brtson 'grus
393a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin// nang stong pa nyid
393a4('bum): la slob pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la
393a5('bum): slob pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mtha' las
393a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang
393a7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid la slob yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa
393b1('bum): nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/
393b2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ dbang po lnga la
393b3('bum): slob pa yin/ stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ 'phag
393b4('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
393b5('bum): bzhi la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i
393b6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa la slob pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin/
393b7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ so so yang
394a1('bum): sam gyi rnamapa shes pa nyidi la slong pa yin
394a2('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la slob pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi
394a3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor
394a4('bum): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
394a5('bum): nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
394a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rab tu shes te/ gzugs ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin
394a7('bum): nyid ji lta bu yin par rab tu shes so// de la ji ltar na gzugs shes bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na dbu ba'i phung po snying po med pa ltar shin du gsod
394a8('bum): ldong dang / shin du gas chags dang / shin du snying pa med par rab tu shes te/ de ltar na gzugs shes bya ba yin no// ji ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang /
394b1('bum): 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang
394b2('bum): nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de/ gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin
394b3('bum): nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma
394b4('bum): yin/ 'bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar gzugs
394b5('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na chu'i chu bur gsog du 'dug pa/ skye zhing 'gag pa ltar
394b6('bum): shes pa ste/ de ltar na tsher ba zhes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang
394b7('bum): 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar tshor ba'i skye
395a1('bum): ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag 'ong ba
395a2('bum): med 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ byin ci log mo zhing de nyid du gnas
395a3('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/
395a4('bum): smig rgyu la chu shin du mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/
395a5('bum): 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pa/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang
395a6('bum): du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar 'du shes skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du
395a7('bum): shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma
395b1('bum): yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no//
395b2('bum): ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ chu shing shun pa so sor phye na snying po shin du mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed
395b3('bum): rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du yang 'gro ba
395b4('bum): med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa ste/ gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed
395b5('bum): kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag 'ong ba med
395b6('bum): 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin/ byin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin
395b7('bum): du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di
396a1('bum): lta ste dper na sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no// /
396a2('bum): ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du yang 'gro ba med pas/
396a3('bum): gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang /
396a4('bum): 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag
396a5('bum): 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin 'bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing //
396a6('bum): de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes
396a7('bum): pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong ngo // phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/ de ltar na
396b1('bum): skye mched rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na// mig gi khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong / gzugs
396b2('bum): kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
396b3('bum): rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sgra'i khams kyang sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i
396b4('bum): khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dri'i khams
396b5('bum): kyang dri'i khams kyi rang bzhin stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i khams kyang lce'i khams kyi
396b6('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ro'i khams kyang ro'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i kham
396b7('bum): gyis stong ngo // lus kyi khams kyang lus kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // reg gi khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi
397a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams/
397a2('bum): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
397a3('bum): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // zhes bya bar shes te/ de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin/ ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/
397a4('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med
397a5('bum): pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa ste/
397a6('bum): de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa
397a7('bum): shes pa yin/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags/
397b1('bum): pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa yin/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ gnyis las rnam par
397b2('bum): grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ gnyis su med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin no// de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang 'gog
397b3('bum): par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin
397b4('bum): nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni/ ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin/ de bzhin du kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa
397b5('bum): shes pa dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang shin du shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// de nas tshe/
397b6('bum): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
397b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos 'di dag de ltar 'tshal na/ des chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'khrug par mi 'gyu
398a1('bum): ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni//
398a2('bum): rnam par 'khrug par yang 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so// gal te dmigs na ni chos kyi dbying
398a3('bum): kyang rnam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ de bzhin
398a4('bum): gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so// de ltar ma dmigs pa/ chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs
398a5('bum): pa'i chos gzhan no// zhes bya bar brtags pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
398a6('bum): la spyod pas/ chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
398a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la slab par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
398b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so//
398b2('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin
398b3('bum): gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi dbyings ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor
398b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings 'dri ni 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas
398b5('bum): pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang 'dus ma
398b6('bum): byas kyi chos thams cad de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ chos kyi
398b7('bum): dbyings la slob pas/ chos thams cad la bslab par 'gyur ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad kyi dbyings lags na/
399a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
399a2('bum): tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
399a3('bum): khams dang / skye mched rnams dang 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
399a4('bum): byin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting
399a5('bum): 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi// ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byi stong
399a6('bum): pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bsla
399a7('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab
399b1('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dor ba med
399b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang gi
399b3('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
399b4('bum): ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab
399b5('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par
399b6('bum): bgyi/ ji ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
399b7('bum): ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med pa bzhi la
400a1('bum): bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par
400a2('bum): bgyi/ ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa l+ya bsngal
400a3('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar mngon par shes pa drug la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab pa
400a4('bum): bgyi/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la
400a5('bum): bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ba chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
400a6('bum): btang snyoms chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang /
400a7('bum): dpe byad bzang po brgya ba cu yongs su grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sa
400b1('bum): ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal chen bzhig
400b2('bum): ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtshe ma'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab
400b3('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phrul dga'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzhan 'phrul
400b4('bum): dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtshangs ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs lha nye pan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi
400b5('bum): ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar bgyi bas bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/
400b6('bum): ji ltar snang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung snang gi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chad med snang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la/
400b7('bum): bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji skar chung dge'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chad med de
401a1('bum): pa'i ska skye bar bgyib la bslab par 'a/ 'gar dge rgyas kyi spa skye bar bgyi ba la bsgrub par bgyi/ de ltar chung che'i lda skyes
401a2('bum): bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chad med che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/
401a3('bum): kar 'du shes med pa'i sems can du skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bu la bslab cing / der yang mi skye bar bgyi/
401a4('bum): ltar na nam mkha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi/
401a5('bum): ba la bslab cing / der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar
401a6('bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/
401a7('bum): ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gsum pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bzhi pa la bslab par bgyi
401b1('bum): ji ltar sems bskyed pa lnga pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems skyed pa drug pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems skyed pa bdun pa la bslab par bgyi/
401b2('bum): ji ltar sems bskyed pa brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa dgu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/
401b3('bum): ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la bslab par bgyi
401b4('bum): ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub
401b5('bum): kyi lam la bslabs shing / chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te
401b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas// gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ 'du shes
401b7('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la 'grib par bgyi// mig la bslab par bgyi/ rnapal bslab par bgyi/ sngal bsab
402a1('bum): bgyi/ lce la bslab par bgyi/ lus la bslab par bgyi/ yid la bslab par bgyi// gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ sgra la bslab
402a2('bum): par bgyi/ dri la bslab par bgyi/ ro la bslab par bgyi/ reg la bslab par bgyi/ chos la bslab par bgyi// mig gi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/
402a3('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa
402a4('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par
402a5('bum): bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ snang 'das te rag pa la bslab par bka/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te/
402a6('bum): reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus
402a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab
402b1('bum): par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi// sa'i khams la
402b2('bum): bslab par bgyi/ chu'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ me'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rlung gi khams la bslab par bgyi/ nam mkha'i khams la bslab par
402b3('bum): bgyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi// ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/
402b4('bum): ming dang gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi/ reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sred pa la bslab par
402b5('bum): bgyi/ len pa la bslab par bgyi/ srid pa la bslab par bgyi/ skye ba la bslab par bgyi/ rga shi la bslab par bgyi// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
402b6('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
402b7('bum): pa la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi// nang stong pa nyid la bslab pa/
403a1('bum): bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ byi na stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
403a2('bum): na pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus ma byas stong
403a3('bum): nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mtha' cwa 'das bstong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dor ba med pa
403a4('bum): stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong
403a5('bum): nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab
403a6('bum): par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la
403a7('bum): bslab par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ dbang po rnams la bslab par bgyi/ stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub
403b1('bum): kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/
403b2('bum): bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/ tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi
403b3('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
403b4('bum): ma med pa dang smon pa med pa bslab par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams
403b5('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa
403b6('bum): rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byam ma chen po la bslab par bgyi/ snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab
403b7('bum): par bgyi/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par gyi
404a1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rnam
404a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa 'am/ mi
404a3('bum): spro ba spros par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba lags grang // /
404a4('bum): bam po bcu bdun pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbying
404a5('bum): la ni/ rnam par rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs
404a6('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
404a7('bum): ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du shes las
404b1('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings
404b2('bum): ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam
404b3('bum): par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis
404b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig nyis
404b5('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go// rna ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
404b6('bum): te/ rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
404b7('bum): ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o// lce yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce las gud na yang chos
405a1('bum): kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o// lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lag/
405a2('bum): lus las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so// yid kyang chos kyi dbyings
405a3('bum): ma lags/ yid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyang
405a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
405a5('bum): nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sgra las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
405a6('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o// dri yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dri las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbying
405a7('bum): so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o// ro yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ro las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ro nyid kyang chos
405a8('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o// reg kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
405b1('bum): reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go// chos kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
405b2('bum): chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi rnam
405b3('bum): par shes pa las gud na yang / chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
405b4('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
405b5('bum): mchis te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang
405b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// /
405b7('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang
405b8('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i rnam par shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi/
406a1('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
406a2('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi
406a3('bum): dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
406a4('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang
406a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus
406a6('bum): te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang
406a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg
406b1('bum): pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o//
406b2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang
406b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus
406b4('bum): te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus
406b5('bum): te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
406b6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis/
406b7('bum): tsher ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus
407a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
407a2('bum): tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
407a3('bum): mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i
407a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus
407a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
407a6('bum): tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
407a7('bum): gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
407b1('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
407b2('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la
407b3('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gad na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
407b4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings
407b5('bum): ma lags/ sa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ si'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i
407b6('bum): khams so// chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chu'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
407b7('bum): so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ me'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te
408a1('bum): me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
408a2('bum): rlung gi khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam
408a3('bum): mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nam mkha'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi
408a4('bum): dbyingaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i kham so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las
408a5('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khamaso//
408a6('bum): ma rig pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
408a7('bum): nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
408b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
408b2('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma mangs so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags//
408b3('bum): ming dang gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so//
408b4('bum): skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye mched drug las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingasaso// /
408b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid
408b6('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba yang chos kyi dbying ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang mchos kyi dbyings ma
408b7('bum): mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sred pa las gud na yang chos kyi
409a1('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/ sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma
409a2('bum): lags/ len pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa yang
409a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ srid pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid
409a4('bum): ba'o// skye ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
409a5('bum): nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rga shi las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
409a6('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi
409a7('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi
409b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
409b2('bum): pa yang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
409b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
409b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang
409b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// /
409b6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam
409b7('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos
410a1('bum): dbyings ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
410a2('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nang stong pa nyid
410a3('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// byi stong pa
410a4('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byi stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
410a5('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
410a6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
410a7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
410b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chen po stong pa nyid las gud na chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chen po stong pa
410b2('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ don dam pa stong pa
410b3('bum): nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do//
410b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid
410b5('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus ma byas
410b6('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas
410b7('bum): stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbying ma lags/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
411a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog
411a2('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ thog ma
411a3('bum): dang tha ma med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyin
411a4('bum): ma lags/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang / chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
411a5('bum): dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos
411a6('bum): kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad
411a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos thams cad stong pa
411b1('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang gi
411b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
411b3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbying
411b4('bum): ma mchis te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong
411b5('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lase gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang
411b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ngo bo nyid
411b7('bum): stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyidado//
412a1('bum): mam ma nyid stong pa nad kyang chos kyi dbyir so//
412a2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang
412a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags//
412a4('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying
412a5('bum): nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma legs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na
412a6('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so//
412a7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrul
412a8('bum): gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma
412b1('bum): ma lags/ dbang po rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang
412b2('bum): po rnams so// stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stobs rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stobs nyid
412b3('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byang
412b4('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
412b5('bum): kyang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam nyid kyang
412b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam mo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden
412b7('bum): pa rnams las gud na yang chos dbyings ma mchis te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i
413a1('bum): bden pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/
413a2('bum): bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags//
413a3('bum): tshad med pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so//
413a4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi
413a5('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
413a6('bum): 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par thar pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par
413a7('bum): thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos
413b1('bum): kyi dbyings ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
413b2('bum): par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
413b3('bum): pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa las gud
413b4('bum): na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyi
413b5('bum): nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mngon par
413b6('bum): shes pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par
413b7('bum): shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ting nge
414a1('bum): 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi
414a2('bum): dbyings ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
414a3('bum): dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
414a4('bum): rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin
414a5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
414a6('bum): mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang
414a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos
414b1('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyangaso so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byam bachen po la
414b2('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje
414b3('bum): chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ snying rje chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ snying rje chen po yang chos kyi dbyings so//
414b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
414b5('bum): pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
414b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gud na
414b7('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bul/
415a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi
415a2('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/
415a3('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma legs/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyir mi 'ong
415a4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/
415a5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bco
415a6('bum): pa nyid do// rang byang chub kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang byang chub las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang chas
415a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub po// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam gyi rnam pa
415b1('bum): shes pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam
415b2('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
415b3('bum): mchis te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis
415b4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
415b5('bum): gzugs so// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du
415b6('bum): shes so// 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
415b7('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa shes pa'o// mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go// rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
416a1('bum): na pa'o// sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyis so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
416a2('bum): kyang lce'o// lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so// yid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do// gzugs
416a3('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang smra'o// dri nyid kyang chos kyi
416a4('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o// ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ro'o// reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
416a5('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
416a6('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o//
416a7('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
416b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o//
416b2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
416b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o//
416b4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
416b5('bum): dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//
416b6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid
416b7('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi
417a1('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid
417a2('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so//
417a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying
417a4('bum): nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
417a5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams
417a6('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i
417a7('bum): khams so// rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so//
417b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i
417b2('bum): khams so// ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings te
417b3('bum): kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbying //
417b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ reg pa nyid
417b5('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyi
417b6('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings kyang sred pa'o// len pa yang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi
417b7('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
418a1('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pharom
418a2('bum): tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i
418a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbying
418a4('bum): so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
418a5('bum): nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
418a6('bum): byin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
418a7('bum): dbyings nyid kyang byi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
418b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
418b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam
418b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying
418b4('bum): zhid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las
418b5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi
418b6('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
418b7('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa
418b8('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying
419a1('bum): nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa
419a2('bum): stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos
419a3('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
419a4('bum): kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam
419a5('bum): so// yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnam so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi
419a6('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so//
419a7('bum): stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
419b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan
419b2('bum): lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid
419b3('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshang
419b4('bum): med pa rnams so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
419b5('bum): pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i rlom sa
419b6('bum): 'phra dri so// sa kyi kyi kyis garnas pa mams par 'dun pamamapa// pa pa rnam
419b7('bum): ya ma kyi kyi ma pa nan nyid sa ma yi pa ma
420a1('bum): kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ning dgang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so//
420a2('bum): mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so//
420a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen
420a4('bum): de'o// snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi
420a5('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
420b1('bum): dbyings nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig byir
420b2('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa
420b3('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang
420b4('bum): byang chub po// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad
420b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sem
420b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs par chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par
420b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par yang mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
421a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes nas/ chos thams cad ming med pa la ming
421a2('bum): dang brdas chos ston to// 'di ni gzugs shes bya'o// 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du shes zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du byed zhes bya'o// 'di ni rnam
421a3('bum): par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni mig ces bya'o// 'di ni rna ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid ces
421a4('bum): bya'o// 'di ni gzugs zhes bya'o// 'di ni sgra zhes bya'o// 'di ni dri zhes bya'o// 'di ni ro zhes bya'o// 'di ni reg zhes bya'o// 'di ni chos zhes bya'o//
421a5('bum): 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes
421a6('bum): pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o//
421a7('bum): 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'das te reg pa zhes bya
421b1('bum): 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes
421b2('bum): bya'o// 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
421b3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sa'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni chu'i khams zhes bya'o//
421b4('bum): 'di ni me'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni rlung gi khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o//
421b5('bum): 'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du byed ces bya'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o// 'di ni skye mched drug
421b6('bum): zhes bya'o// 'di ni reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sred pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni len pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni srid pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni
421b7('bum): skye ba zhes bya'o// 'di na rga shi zhes bya'o// 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni bzod pa'i
422a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
422a2('bum): bya'o// 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni nang stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid zhes
422a3('bum): bya'o// 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'dus byas stong
422a4('bum): pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
422a5('bum): pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhes bya'o//
422a6('bum): 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni ngo bo
422a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni yang dag
422b1('bum): par spong ba rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni dbang po rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni stobs rnams zhes bya'o//
422b2('bum): 'di dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa
422b3('bum): rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni bsam gtan rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni tshad med pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
422b4('bum): pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni
422b5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang sman pa med pa zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin
422b6('bum): rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya'o// 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya'o// 'ang dag na ma 'jigs pa
422b7('bum): rnams zhes pa'o// 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o//
423a1('bum): 'di ni sring rje chen po zhes bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya'o// 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i rabs
423a2('bum): bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya'o// 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di
423a3('bum): ni rang byang chub zhes bya'o// 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhes bya'o// 'di ni bla na med pa yang
423a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub zhes bya'o zhes ston to// sa ma 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma byed pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/
423a5('bum): rdzas kyi rnam pa gyi na zhig la brten te/ gzugs kyi bye brag sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ glang po yi gzugs sam/ rta'i gzugs sam/ ban glang gi
423a6('bum): gzugs sam/ rnga mo 'am/ lug gi gzugs sam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs sam/ bskyed mos tshal dang / gzhal
423a7('bum): med khang dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba mdangs dga' ba dang / rdzing du mdangs dga' ba dang / nags tshal mdangs dga' ba
423b1('bum): dag sprul cing / de dag tu stan dang / 'khor gyi stan dang / gzhi rnam pa sna tshogs bting ste/ me tog dang / 'greng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang/
423b2('bum): spyan gzigs zhim po dag stan dam/ glu dang / sil snyan gyis skye bo dag dga' bar byas nas/ sbyin pa yongs su btang ba 'am/ tshul khrims srung ba 'am/
423b3('bum): bzod pa sgrub pa 'am/ brtson 'grus brtsam pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par brtse ba 'am/ shes rab bsgom pa 'am/ rnam pa de lta bu bdag
423b4('bum): gis skye bo dga' bar byas te/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su bstan dam/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su bstan tam/ khyim
423b5('bum): bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs bstan tam/ ri rab bstan tam/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha
423b6('bum): rnams bstan tam/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams bstan tam/ gzhan 'phrul
423b7('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs lha nye pan gyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnam
424a1('bum): bstan tam/ tshangs kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung snang gi lha rnams bstan tam/
424a2('bum): med snang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung dge'i lha rnams bstan ta/
424a3('bum): tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams bstan tam/ tshe ma'i lha rnams bstan tam/ chung che'i lharnams bstan tam/ chad me
424a4('bum): lha rnams bstan tam/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ mi che ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ mi gdung ba'i lha rnams bstan tam/ shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams
